query:
UPDATE 
                http_trigger 
            SET 
                script_path = $1, 
                path = $2, 
                is_flow = $3, 
                http_method = $4,
                static_asset_config = $5, 
                edited_by = $6, 
                email = $7, 
                is_async = $8, 
                windmill_auth = $9, 
                edited_at = now(), 
                is_static_website = $10
            WHERE 
                workspace_id = $11 AND 
                path = $12
